name: ChromeStuck
description:
A space shooter where the wall try to crush you

Use the right color to fight the enemies and to repell these maleficient walls.
Need a gamepad controller to work, ideally an XBOX controller

Thanks to qubodup for the gamepad scheme: https://www.deviantart.com/qubodup

Sound effects made with sfxr http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html

Please enjoy !
